title: BRIEF-Turkish Airlines To Purchase Total Of 60 Wide Body Aircraft
text: March 9, 2018 / 4:54 PM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-Turkish Airlines To Purchase Total Of 60 Wide Body Aircraft Reuters Staff March 9 (Reuters) - TURKISH AIRLINES: * TO PURCHASE A TOTAL OF 60 WIDE BODY AIRCRAFTS * TO BUY TOTAL OF 30 B787-9 AIRCRAFT FROM BOEING AND TOTAL OF 30 A350-900 AIRCRAFT FROM BOEING * DECIDES TO PURCHASE 1 A330-200F CARGO AIRCRAFT FROM DVB BANK SE * 6 OF AIRCRAFTS TO BE DELIVERED IN 2019, 14 IN 2020, 10 IN 2021, 12 IN 2012, 11 IN 2023 AND 7 IN 2024 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
